text: nam israyilin cantatiyinaraik katalaikkatantu (alaittuc) cenrapotu, tankalukkuriya vikkirakankalai aratanai ceytu kontirunta oru kuttattar aruke (avarkal) cenrarkal. Utane avarkal, "musave! Avarkalitamirukkum katavulkalaip pol namakkum ninkal oru katavulai akkittaruvirkalaka!" Enru ventinar; "niccayamaka ninkal or arivillata kuttattaraka irukkinrirkal" enru musa (avarkalitam) kurinar
